Package net.kyori.adventure.util

Interface Buildable<R,B extends Buildable.Builder<R>>

Type Parameters:
R - the type that can be built
B - the builder type
All Known Subinterfaces:
BlockNBTComponent, Book, BuildableComponent<C,B>, ComponentFlattener, EntityNBTComponent, JoinConfiguration, KeybindComponent, NBTComponent<C,B>, Pointers, ScoreComponent, SelectorComponent, StorageNBTComponent, Style, TextComponent, TextReplacementConfig, TranslatableComponent, VirtualComponent
public interface Buildable<R,B extends Buildable.Builder<R>>
Something that can be built.
